analysis.narrative:
ðŸ“Š **Consensus:** Bearish with medium conviction - sources show 65%+ bullish sentiment quantitatively, but qualitative analysis reveals structural technical weakness overwhelming tactical catalysts, creating fragile rally conditions vulnerable to reversals.

ðŸ“ˆ **Themes:** (1) Technical breakdown across major indices with broken support levels and institutional distribution patterns, (2) Crypto/fintech regulatory momentum providing sector-specific tailwinds against broader market weakness, (3) Earnings visibility deterioration creating "show me" market dynamic where guidance cuts outweigh monetary accommodation.

key_themes: Technical breakdown with broken moving averages and weak breadth
Crypto regulatory momentum and fintech product launches
Earnings guidance deterioration versus Fed rate cut support
AI sector evolution from mega-cap concentration to broader commercialization
Labor market deterioration as potential cycle inflection signal
risk_factors: Continued earnings disappointments and forward guidance cuts eroding rally foundation
Employment data acceleration to downside validating recession fears
High-volume institutional distribution overwhelming retail bullish sentiment
Geopolitical uncertainty and policy shifts creating volatility spikes
Dealer gamma positioning creating strong resistance at call walls limiting upside
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $670 put wall support (9k OI) critical hold, $681 call wall resistance (17k OI). QQQ: $595 put wall support (7k OI), $600 immediate test (6k OI), $610-$613 resistance cluster. Testing max pain gravitational pull.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Break below $670 max pain opens $665 support (7k OI), upside capped at $680-$681 call wall cluster (33k combined OI). QQQ: $595 put wall critical multi-day support, $615 call wall (13k OI) major resistance. Sector rotation into defensives suggests downside bias through year-end.

regime.label: NEUTRAL
regime.summary: Market is lacking clear direction. Wait for confirmation.

action.summary: NEUTRAL: No clear edge. Cash is a position.
